&ltTBL>.IS_MARKED() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.IS_MARKED() Description The &ltTBL>.IS_MARKED() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record is marked. Example This script checks if the current record is marked. dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() status = tbl.is_marked()
See Also Table Functions and Methods
